value.title: A new approach for dynamic Power BI visuals?
value.excerpt: Want to give report users a way to control Power BI visuals dynamically? Don't want to use the personalize visual feature? Interesting!!! Patrick has an approach that may fit the need!  Dynamic X and Y Axis in Power BI visuals? Yes please! https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1eurc0EY2Xg  A different perspective

value.title: Call any Power BI REST API with PowerShell
value.excerpt: Not sure what a REST API is? Or what you can do with them in Power BI? Find out how you can easily take advantage of them without having to write a bunch of code. value.title: Composite models in Power BI and Storage modes - what to pick???

Storage mode gives you options, but why would I pick one versus the other for my dimension tables? Adam has you covered!
